titleStmt.title: The first proposal submitted by the Russian Minister, Prince Petr Alekseevich Golitsyn, to the Imperial Vice-Chancellor, Count Dominik Andreas Kaunitz
titleStmt.author: Petr
Alekseevich
Golitsyn

head.title: 20 January 1702 (o.s.). – The first proposal submitted by the Russian Minister, Count Petr Alekseevich Golitsyn, to the Imperial Vice-Chancellor, Count Dominik Andreas Kaunitz

note.bibl: RGADA, fond 32, opis 1, 1702, no. 4, f. 1v–2v. Translation into Latin from a Russian copy.

div.p: Post Exhibitionem Creditivj-iv- is corrected from: vi. ad Sacram Cæsaream Majestatem, et Super Negotia Com[m]issa interrogatus, in Manus Excellentissimj Domini Vice-Cancellary Imperialis, Comitis de Kaunitz, Mensem suæ Czareæ Majestatis hisce declarat

Sua Czarea Majestas subter Conclusionem Biennalis Armistity Turcico Tartarici, in memoriam reuocavit: quōd sacra Cæsarea Majestas, cum Serenissimo Rege et Republ[ica] Poloniarum die .31. Marty Anno .1683. Generalium Comitiorum, Varsaviæ percusserit Foedus Offensivum et Defensiuum, se invicem taliter exhortantes: quatenus Utraq[ue] Pars serenissimos Moscorum

Czaros Omni Curā ad hanc societatem invitarent, flecterentq[ue]. Posteaquam igitur rebus Domi Compositis, ex inuitatu, sua Czarea Majestas Legationem Viennam expediuisset-u- is corrected from: s., Foederis Conditiones audiendi amplectendi; Ablegatus Cosmas Nikiticz Nefimōnow, in Tercia Conferentia die .30. May 1696. ad Responsionem Excel[lenti]s[sim]j Ministery CæsareiIn the text there is: Cæserei., paragraphis fin .6.ti initio .7.mi Conclusive, regessit. tribus Annis Foederis exspirantibusFirst -i- is corrected from: e, -a- is corrected from: i., utrique Parti, Magnis Dominis, Fraternus pristinus Amor, et Amicabile Commercium Correspondentiæ manebunt in suo pristino Vigore et affectu; si autem utrisq[ue] MagnisCorrected from: Magnisq[ue]. Dominis, tam suæ Czareæ, quam Cæsaræ Majestati, cordi esset, acceptabile hoc Foedus? et Inimicus intenderet-et is corrected from: ct (?). adversūs utramq[ue] Partem Offensivum Bellum promouere? et jam elapsi essent IlliI- is corrected from: t. Tres Anni? tunc inter Utramq[ue] Partem, tam de Foederis, quām Annorum Prolongatione, posset fieri per Internuntios ulterios Tractatio et Prolongatio. Juxta quam Propositionem, et desuper factam Excelsi Ministery Relationem, atq[ue] subsecutam sacræ Cæsareæ Majestis Ratihabitionem, tanquam stipulationis et Compromissionis antecedentis, sua Czarea Majestas sensum Foederis |:si Inimicus intenderet, adversūs utramq[ue] Partem, Offensiuum Bellum promovere:| nequaquam uellet periculo Posteritatis exponere; sed nunc potiūs inter senes Regnantes et Ministros, euentualiter in Cautelam prævenire, posteaquam Fulgida Porta Cum sacra Cæsarea Majestate ad 25 AnnosIn the copy from the Latin translation there is written further: duntaxat; cum sua Czarea autem M[ajes]t[a]te ad 30. Annos. Armistitium pepegit; Ambos igitur jam præmonuit: sibi præfixum et præconceptum esse, Finitis Armistitys, Amissa repetendiThen crossed out: mor. more pristino, dum pugnarent singuli uincerentur omnes. Quamobrem tam Foederis Reassumptionem, quam Annorum Prolongationem anticipandi Cara superest, usq[ue] ad plenum effectum, Foedere Cæsareo-Polonico expressum: sit ergo

Inter altē memoratas Majestates Eorumq[ue] in Throno successoresFirst -c- is corrected from: i., Regna et Provincias, Offensivj et Defensiuj Belli societas! Prima |:scilicet Offensivj:| ad gloriosam et stabilem cum Hoste Communj utriusq[ue] Partis Pacificationem duratura. Altera |:Defensivj:| ad ejusdem Pacis perennem Conseruationem perpetuum permansura. Porrō Instrumentum Cæsareo Polonicum Foedus quidem ita restrinxitAfter -n- crossed out: xit.: Eadem Belli societas limitatur-r is corrected from: s. solius Bellj Turcicj necessitate; nec ad aliud qodvis Bellum ullo prorsūsSecond -r- is corrected from: s. Colore et prætu extendi unquam poterit; an verō nunc, vel proximē imposterum |:prout eventualiter Princeps jam sufficientem Instructionem et Plenipotentiam ad tractandum et concludendum habet:| sua Cæsarea Majestas Foedus in plures Mundi Partes gratiosissime extensum esse velit: id Princeps optionj et Arbitrio submittit. Desuper ex Responsis ulteriorem Ansam prensaturusIn the copy from the Latin translation there is written further: 2. Propensioni et Arbitrio sacræ Cæsareæ M[ajes]t[a]tis com[m]ittitur: an pro studys Regnantium et Ministrorum expediāt, Affinitatibus et Conjugys deinceps magis magisq[ue] devinculari adinvicem? donec paratis Præparatorys et continuatis futurarum necessitatum dispositionibus, Armistity tempora præterlabantur, et felicissima Vota emergant: Utramq[ue] Ecclesiam Romanam et Græcam, Laureis triumphalibus coronandi. Ulteriora Pucta obfirmandæ mutuæ securitatis et eventualis Præcautelæ ad Progressum in Tractatibus reservando.. Actum Viennæ di 20. January a Nativitate saluatoris Nostri Anno .1702. ab orbe ConditoThis is missing in the other Latin copy. –.7210. ./.–18
Сие латинское писмо писано против вышеписанного руского слово в слово.
